title: I hate the new way to fill saved pasword fields, how can I get the old way back?
content:
I now have to right click the password field and select which password I want to use, this is cumbersome and counterintuitive, there is NO hint that password autofill is still there, WTF? if you're dead set on this "new way", how can I have the old way back?

Thanks!
creator: kwizatz

title: how to fill an application form with signature
creator: kigusiutnaktheresa
